name: Claims to an instrument
text: §490:3-306  Claims to an instrument.  A person taking an instrument, other than a person having rights of a holder in due course, is subject to a claim of a property or possessory right in the instrument or its proceeds, including a claim to rescind a negotiation and to recover the instrument or its proceeds.  A person having rights of a holder in due course takes free of the claim to the instrument. [L 1991, c 118, pt of §1]
